message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get this valuable item at a discount. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I appreciate the discount, but I'm looking to spend closer to $10000. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob! I understand that you're looking to spend around $10000, but I have to make sure I get a good deal too. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $11500. What do you think?
